ai-tika-abh02t24:84_8: There is no one thing for the Dhamma that is invited to accept thoughts, and there is no liable to fact that.
ai-tika-abh02t24:84_10: His schism is the break up of the deathless.
ai-tika-abh02t24:84_11: Therefore it is not known that what is in function can be known as to presume for the sake of the Dhamma, since this is the practice of the Dhamma is similar.
ai-tika-abh02t24:85_0: The commentary on the discourses is finished.
ai-tika-abh02t24:87_0: Your mindfulness is established by the body, and this is how it should be understood. But when there is something else, it is him in any way that has arisen, it is possible to improvement it. ...” ...
ai-tika-abh02t24:87_1: having taught it, you can ever.”
ai-tika-abh02t24:87_2: After having rejoiced in the persons, he perceives that it is the foremost.
ai-tika-abh02t24:87_3: Likewise the miraculously coming to the noble ones,
ai-tika-abh02t24:87_4: don’t practice absorption in the case of the basic : they are pure in this.
